      • downloadConfig

        @RequestMapping(value="/config",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<byte[]> downloadConfig()
        Serve the config.txt for download. Note that it is processed again [save(bos)] to avoid deletion of the file between saving and loading.
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity directly serves the file for download for the browser
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - of type
